alert.note: Alert for Kandiyohi (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Tornado Warning issued May 06 at 6:26PM CDT until May 06 at 7:00PM CDT by NWS Minneapolis
info.description: The National Weather Service in the Twin Cities has issued a * Tornado Warning for... Southwestern Kandiyohi County in central Minnesota... * Until 700 PM CDT. * At 626 PM CDT, a confirmed tornado was located over Prinsburg, or 14 miles south of Willmar, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Damaging tornado and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Weather spotters confirmed tornado. IMPACT...Flying debris will be dangerous to those caught without shelter. Mobile homes will be damaged or destroyed. Damage to roofs, windows, and vehicles will occur. Tree damage is likely. * This tornadic thunderstorm will remain over mainly rural areas of southwestern Kandiyohi County, including the following locations... Svea. TORNADO...OBSERVED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN
info.instruction: To repeat, a tornado is on the ground. TAKE COVER NOW! Move to a basement or an interior room on the lowest floor of a sturdy building. Avoid windows. If you are outdoors, in a mobile home, or in a vehicle, move to the closest substantial shelter and protect yourself from flying debris. This storm has a history of producing tornadoes. Do not wait to see or hear the tornado. TAKE COVER NOW!
